title: GKhair CurlsDefineHer and VolumizeHer Spray 3.4 Oz
features: This Curls Activator is a combination of cream moisturizer and curl activator, that enhances manageability and gives style, body and shine to your natural curls.
ENCOURAGES lots of added bounce and softness while repairing all dry or damaged hair, leave it with a radiant shine.
INSTANT Volume: Just spray through damp hair then dry for incredible thickness and hair volume - Gives you a layered textured finish with a light hold that looks great and lasts the entire day.
NON-STICKY FORMULA: Our super formula wont leave a sticky buildup in your hair and won't weigh it down like other products and washes out easily with water or shampoo.

GREAT FOR YOUR HAIR: Packed with minerals and nutrients to promote healthy hair - Absorbs excess oil and moisture to keep your scalp clean and healthy - One of the best volumizing hair products for hair health.
